description: One of the largest e-commerce platforms in South Asia, Daraz offers a vast range of products, including electronics, fashion, home appliances, and more. Known for its user-friendly interface and regular promotions, it provides fast delivery and secure payment options, making online shopping accessible to millions.

coupons.description: Get 50% off on your first purchase.
Free delivery on orders above BDT 1000.
Buy one, get one free on selected items.
Enjoy 20% off on summer collections.

description: A renowned retailer specializing in IT products and gadgets in Bangladesh. StarTech is a trusted name for computers, laptops, PC components, gaming accessories, and tech solutions, delivering high-quality products and excellent after-sales service.

coupons.description: Get BDT 500 off on your first purchase above BDT 5000.
Enjoy 10% off on gadgets over BDT 3000.
Free shipping on orders above BDT 1500.
Save BDT 200 when you spend over BDT 2000.

description: A health-tech platform focused on making healthcare accessible. Aroggo offers online pharmacy services, telemedicine consultations, and health-related products, helping users connect with doctors and medicines seamlessly.

coupons.description: 10% off on health supplements.
15% off on all fitness equipment.
Save BDT 5 on health supplements purchase above BDT 500.
Free shipping on health-related products above BDT 1000.
coupons.condition: Valid on health products only, above BDT 1000.

description: The leading online bookstore in Bangladesh, Rokomari is a hub for book lovers, offering a wide collection of academic, fiction, and non-fiction titles. With nationwide delivery and a user-friendly site, it’s a favorite for readers.

coupons.description: Get BDT 100 off on books above BDT 1000.
15% off on orders of books above BDT 1500.
Free shipping on book orders above BDT 800.
coupons.condition: Valid for book orders above BDT 800.

coupons.description: 20% off on book bundles.

description: One of Bangladesh’s largest online marketplaces, AjkerDeal offers a variety of products at competitive prices. It focuses on providing value with frequent deals, discounts, and a broad product selection, making online shopping easier for customers.

coupons.description: Get 20% off on all orders.
Get BDT 500 off on your next order above BDT 3000.

description: A global food delivery platform, Foodpanda connects customers with their favorite restaurants and grocery stores. Known for fast delivery and exclusive discounts, it ensures convenience for food and grocery shopping.

coupons.description: Get free delivery on your first order.
Get 20% off on food orders above BDT 1000.
Save BDT 50 on snacks orders above BDT 500.
coupons.condition: Valid on snacks orders above BDT 500.

coupons.description: Free drink with every order above BDT 700.

description: A rising brand in Bangladesh specializing in smart gadgets, fitness trackers, and tech accessories. MotionView combines innovation with affordability to enhance the lifestyle of tech enthusiasts.

coupons.description: Save BDT 1000 on cameras above BDT 10000.
Get 10% off on all camera accessories.
Save BDT 500 on cameras above BDT 5000.
Free delivery on camera purchases above BDT 7000.
coupons.condition: Valid for camera orders above BDT 7000.

description: A pioneer in online grocery shopping in Bangladesh, Chaldal delivers fresh fruits, vegetables, meat, and daily essentials directly to your doorstep. With a focus on convenience and quality, it caters to busy urban lifestyles, offering same-day delivery and affordable prices.

coupons.description: Save BDT 200 on your first grocery order.
Get 10% off on grocery orders above BDT 1500.
